---
title: WeRelate Monthly Activity Report
---

Here is the activity in WeRelate for the month (2026-01-01 to 2026-01-02):

There were 16 active users
making 974 edits to 477 pages (Person and Family)
of those pages, 233 (162 Person) of them were newly created.

There were 0 people who joined WeRelate this month:
